definitions.definition: The design and operation of a system or process to make it as good as possible in some defined sense .
The reduction of a program or algorithm to its most efficient form, as during compilation , by removing unused portions of code and improving the speed or resource usage of others.

main_definition: The design and operation of a system or process to make it as good as possible in some defined sense .
secondary_definitions: ( programming ) The reduction of a program or algorithm to its most efficient form, as during compilation , by removing unused portions of code and improving the speed or resource usage of others.
